Ther'e is a new version available for our web app, with new features.
The update will be available immediately.

retrieve.title: Restore previous data?
retrieve.message: We've detected you've used the contractions timer in the last 20 minutes. Should we restore the data?

a2hs.title: Add to home screen
a2hs.info:
Your browser allows installing the web page as an app.
It's completly free, and uses no extra storage!
Click here!

pulse.name: Pulse calculator
pulse.click-area: Click the grey area to start timer

metronome.name: CPR Metronome
metronome.touch: Touch the screen to start metronome

vital.name: Vital signs calculator
vital.clarify: The information brought here is based on MADA's medical literature, and may vary between patients. This information is not medical advice.

apgar.name: APGAR calculator
info: If apgar score is below 4, start CPR immediately.
If Apgar score is between 4 and 6, oxygenate the baby.
Apgar score higher than 6 is considered normal.

glazgo.name: Glasgow calculator
info: Glasgow lower than 9 is a deep coma.
A score between 9 to 12 is a moderate coma.
Glasgow 12 or higher is a light coma.

dictionary.name: Medical dictionary
dictionary.not-found: No items in dictionary match the term

forms.name: Form dictation
forms.bill-err: Bill needs to have a price
forms.price-err: Price needs to belong to a bill

contact-page.name: Contact us
contact-page.change-name-btn: Click here to change your name
contact-page.no-message-desc: No messages were sent from this account. You can send a message right here.
contact-page.seen: Your message was seen by an admin
contact-page.whatsapp: Click this message to contact us via WhatsApp
contact-page.warning-msg:
We're app devlopers, completely unrelated to MADA, therefore don't send us emergency calls. call 101!
We're not related to the official MADA app, we cannot help eith issues there, and we can't send you medical calls.
Please help us' and contact only with issues or requests we can help you with, so we can keep our response efficient.

info-page.name: About the app
info-page.desc: About the app and the web version
section:
This app was created by the "AtlowApps" team. All rights are reserved to Chemi@low and Itiel Atlow.
We thank Yossi Cassouto, Yochai Benita and Shakom Sacks for all their help, as well as Rabi Zohar Maman for the "Handling the deceased" pamphlet.
The application was built by MADA volunteers in order to improve existing functionalities, and to create new ones, in order to improve the volunteers abilities.
In case you find an error or a problem in the application, ot if you've got a question or a request for us, you may contact us via the "Contact us" page and we will do our best to respond A.S.A.P.

This application is not an official MADA app.
Any possible implication of using this app, is the complete responsibilty of the user.

privacy-page.name: Privacy policy
privacy-page.desc: The website and application's privacy policy
privacy-page.intro:
AtlowApps ("us", "we", or "our") operates the Mada Reports application (the "Service").

This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use our Service and the choices you have associated with that data.

We use your data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. Unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy, terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions.

private-info.title: Information Collection And Use
private-info.info: We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you.

private-info.title: Personal Data
private-info.info: While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you ("Personal Data"). Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:

usage-data.title: Usage Data
usage-data.info: When you access the Service by or through a mobile device, we may collect certain information automatically, including, but not limited to, the type of mobile device you use, your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of your mobile device, your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browser you use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data ("Usage Data").

data-usage.title: Use of Data
data-usage.info: MADA reports uses the collected data for various purposes:
types: To provide and maintain the Service.
To notify you about changes to our Service.
To provide customer care and support.
To provide analysis or valuable information so that we can improve the Service.
To monitor the usage of the Service.
To detect, prevent and address technical issues.

data-handing.title: Transfer Of Data
data-handing.info:
Your information, including Personal Data, may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from your jurisdiction.

If you are located outside Israel and choose to provide information to us, please note that we transfer the data, including Personal Data, to Israel and process it there.

Your consent to this Privacy Policy followed by your submission of such information represents your agreement to that transfer.

MADA reports will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and no transfer of your Personal Data will take place to an organization or a country unless there are adequate controls in place including the security of your data and other personal information.

law.title: Legal Requirements
law.info: MADA reports may disclose your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to:
types: To comply with a legal obligation
To protect and defend the rights or property of AtlowApps
To prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the Service
To protect the personal safety of users of the Service or the public

data-security.title: Security Of Data
data-security.info:
The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.
While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security

services.title: Service Providers
services.info:
We may employ third party companies and individuals to facilitate our Service ("Service Providers"), to provide the Service on our behalf, to perform Service-related services or to assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.

These third parties have access to your Personal Data only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.info: We may use third-party Service Providers to monitor and analyze the use of our Service.

google.title: Google Analytics
google.info:
Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and reports website traffic. Google uses the data collected to track and monitor the use of our Service. This data is shared with other Google services. Google may use the collected data to contextualize and personalize the ads of its own advertising network.

You may opt-out of certain Google Analytics features through your mobile device settings, such as your device advertising settings or by following the instructions provided by Google in their Privacy Policy:https://policies.google.com/privacy

For more information on the privacy practices of Google, please visit the Google Privacy & Terms web page:https://policies.google.com/privacy

outer-links.title: Links To Other Sites
outer-links.info:
Our Service may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit.

We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.info:
Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 18 ("Children").

We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 18. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your Children has provided us with Personal Data, please contact us. If we become aware that we have collected Personal Data from children without verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers.

updates.title: Changes To This Privacy Policy
updates.info:
We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

We will let you know via email and/or a prominent notice on our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the "effective date" at the top of this Privacy Policy.

You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.info: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
